definitions.body: brimstone (Aram. [[גּוּפְרִיתָא]], also [[כבריתא]], [[כובריתא]], kebriyto0, kubriyto0; Ar. kibriyt (certainly foreign wd.); der. from ([[כּׂפֶר]]), [[גּׁפֶר]] by Thes RobGes, cf. Di Ge 6:14; i.e. pitch, and then other combustibles, esp. sulphur; Lag:1. c. thinks fr. Bactr. vohûkereti)—[[גׇּפְרִית]] Ge 19:24 + 6 t.—brimstone, after [[הִמְטִיר]] Ge 19:24 (J), fig. of judgment Ps 11:6, Ez Eze 38:22 (in all ‖[[אֵשׁ]] etc.), cf. also Job 18:15, Is 34:9, & De 29:22; ´[[נַחַל ג]] simile for the destroying breath of ´[[י]] Is 30:33.
